<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
REAL ESTATE
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/23/masayoshi-son-plans-clean-wework?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
SoftBank Starts to Clean Up
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="wework cleans up " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=447 src="https://morningbrew-oslo.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/1571868501.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="wework cleans up " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://morningbrew-oslo.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/1571868501.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In most rescue stories, we never see what happens after the castaway is saved. But in WeWork's case, we're finding out how exactly Tom Hanks gets his life back after the cargo ship picks him up. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The backstory:</strong> In case you missed it, on Tuesday major WeWork backer SoftBank <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-wework-softbank-group/softbank-clinches-wework-takeover-deal-bailing-out-co-founder-idUSKBN1X11JN?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">agreed to</a> a $10+ billion bailout that gives Masayoshi 80% of the company. Sources told CNBC without the bailout, WeWork <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2019/10/23/without-deal-wework-would-have-been-out-of-money-next-friday-sources-say.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">would have</a> been on track to run dry next week. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>SoftBank had already sunk $10.6 billion in WeWork pre-bailout. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>SoftBank will not treat WeWork as a subsidiary, so it won't have to include WeWork's massive losses on its balance sheet. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The deal reportedly involves co-founder and former CEO Adam Neumann walking away with about $1.7 billion after dropping off the keys, his powerful voting shares, and his chairmanship. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">WeWork employees reportedly <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/10/22/tech/wework-softbank-takeover/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">weren't thrilled</a> about that, especially since many of them aren't sure if they'll have a job soon. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">That's because...</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Yesterday, newly minted executive chairman and SoftBank alum Marcelo Claure <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2019/10/23/weworks-new-chairman-claure-says-layoffs-are-coming-in-internal-memo.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">sent a</a> company-wide memo relaying that layoffs were likely—the <a href="https://www.ft.com/content/ffa49378-f5b4-11e9-a79c-bc9acae3b654?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">FT says</a> as many as 4,000.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>That's about 30% of WeWork's global workforce. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The comeback plan: </strong>Claure and SoftBank reportedly plan to: </p>
<ol>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Get occupancy rates in key markets back to about 90%. As WeWork’s expanded in recent years, they've slipped to under 80%. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Pull out of more auxiliary regions like China. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Lay off </span><span><a href="https://www.businessinsider.com/wework-employees-share-stories-about-barefoot-adam-neumann-2019-9?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">the tequila</a></span><span>. </span>
</li>
</ol>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">What there isn't currently a plan for? </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Neumann. In his new role as "board observer," he'll reportedly have 1) less than 10% of the company's equity and 2) the right to nominate two directors. But it's not clear how involved he'll be. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>Masa Son’s bringing out the Shop-Vac and the Clorox for this cleanup job. His portfolio needs to be in tip-top shape for investors to buy in to a second Vision Fund. </p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
EARNINGS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/23/earnings-rapid-fire?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Earnings Rapid Fire
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="someone driving a golf ball over and over " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=648 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/j3stnrlWnDohnKUWkv/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="someone driving a golf ball over and over " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/j3stnrlWnDohnKUWkv/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Just like you can’t squeeze Vince Vaughn into a dramatic role, you can’t squeeze every earnings report into a single newsletter. But we tried our best.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Tesla </strong>posted a surprise <a href="https://apnews.com/5b9b380c9ba3411c811b220723143283?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">quarterly profit</a> of $143 million and was rewarded with shares jumping more than 20% after hours. Cost-cutting measures are paying off for Elon Musk’s electric vehicle company, which <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-10-23/tesla-surges-as-musk-s-cost-cuts-pay-off-with-surprise-profit?srnd=premium&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">stated</a> “operating expenses are at the lowest level since Model 3 production started.” </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Microsoft </strong>did <a href="https://www.marketwatch.com/story/microsoft-earnings-trounce-expectations-as-quarterly-profit-tops-10-billion-2019-10-23?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Microsoft things</a>. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Boeing </strong>thinks it’ll get U.S. regulatory approval for the grounded 737 Max in Q4. Still, quarterly profit <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-boeing-results/boeing-sees-737-max-u-s-approval-before-year-end-shares-rise-idUSKBN1X21IK?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">dropped 53%</a> during this hailstorm of scrutiny.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Caterpillar’s </strong>earnings usually tell us where the economy’s headed. So? “In the fourth quarter, we now expect end-user demand to be flat and dealers to make further inventory reductions due to global economic uncertainty," <a href="https://www.marketwatch.com/story/caterpillar-cuts-profit-guidance-as-q3-sales-fall-2019-10-23?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">CEO Jim Umpleby said</a>. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Ford </strong>sees <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2019/10/23/ford-earnings-beat-estimates-at-34-cents-per-share-vs-26-cents-expected.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">weakening sales</a> in China.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Chipotle </strong>reported its <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2019/10/23/as-chipotles-stock-slides-analysts-ask-if-its-valuation-has-peaked.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">best same-store sales growth</a> in over two years on Tuesday. Get ready to see more mobile pickup lanes called ”Chipotlanes,” also an excellent name for a bowling alley. </p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
TECH
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/23/google-achieves-quantum-supremacyor?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
What a Google Quants, What a Google Needs
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Yesterday, researchers <a href="https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-019-1666-5?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">announced</a> that Google's quantum processor, Sycamore, achieved "quantum supremacy," meaning it surpassed the computational prowess of every computing system at our disposal today. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Think of Sycamore as the Patriots and current supercomputers as the Jets. </strong>Researchers said they solved in 200 seconds a calculation that would take the world’s best supercomputer 10,000 years. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>This achievement demonstrates "quantum speedup is achievable in a real-world system,” the researchers wrote. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Applications </span><span><a href="https://www.cnet.com/news/google-quantum-computer-leaves-old-school-supercomputer-in-dust/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">could include</a></span><span> random number generation, AI, materials science, and chemistry. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Qubits fired: </strong>Days before the announcement, competitor IBM published a pretort arguing Google 1) <em>didn't</em> achieve supremacy and 2) is <a href="https://www.ibm.com/blogs/research/2019/10/on-quantum-supremacy/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">misleading</a> people by saying it did.  </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><a href="https://www.technologyreview.com/s/614608/google-ceo-quantum-supremacy-interview-with-sundar-pichai/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Google’s CEO</a></span><span>: "It is a technical term of art. People in the community understand exactly what the milestone means." </span><span><em>*Every Google employee nods nervously*</em></span><span>
</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture: </strong>Companies don't usually exchange diss memos on their research blogs. Quantum's a hot field pulling in <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/emerging-tech/stories/2019/10/07/private-investment-quantum-reached-450-million-2017-2018?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">major investments</a> from academia, business, and government. Hitting supremacy would be the biggest breakthrough in decades. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">+ Want to learn more? </strong>Read the <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/emerging-tech/stories/2019/08/15/quantum-computing-giant-leap-tech?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Brew's guide to quantum computing</a>.</p>

<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
RETAIL
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/23/nordstrom-opening-longawaited-nyc-flagship?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Nordstrom Plants Its Flag in Manhattan
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Nordstrom's flagship store " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTcxODU1NTUzLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Today, Nordstrom will open an NYC flagship store decades in the making, Retail Brew’s Halie LeSavage <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/retail/stories/2019/10/23/nordstrom-nyc-flagship-nordstroms-chasing-nyc-locals?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">reports</a>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Somehow, the store has managed to squeeze in as many emerging retail trends as possible under one 320,000-sq.-ft. roof:</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">For the trendsetters:</strong></span><span> It’ll carry all the classic luxury department store brands, plus rotating popups for up-and-comers like Everlane and Reformation. </span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">For the beauty junkies:</strong></span><span> 14,000 sq. ft. of </span><span><a href="https://www.glossy.co/beauty/nordstrom-banks-on-beauty-services-to-drive-customers-to-its-nyc-flagship?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">beauty products</a></span><span> spread across two floors, plus services from blowouts to Botox injections.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">For foodies:</strong></span><span> There are seven food and bev concepts. (Bet you didn’t know food accounts for </span><span><a href="https://www.pymnts.com/news/retail/2019/new-nordstrom-location-to-offer-food-and-drink-to-shoppers/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">one of every four</a></span><span> Nordstrom purchases in stores.) </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The flagship won’t be doing all the heavy lifting. The store is supplemented by two “Nordstrom Local” concept stores, smaller shops where neighborhood customers can go for services like online returns and personal styling consultations. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Halie’s takeaway: </strong>Nordstrom’s flagship ticks each box on the shopping destination checklist. But its real value is unlocking a wider retail ecosystem that balances novelty and convenience.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><em>Want more retail news? It's easy: <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/retail/?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=retailbrew&email={email}" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Sign up for Retail Brew</a>. </em></p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
AUTHOR SERIES
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/23/shane-parrish-will-teach-think?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;" class="">
<font color="#000000">
Shane Parrish Will Make You Go <img style="max-width: 20px;" src="https://emojipedia-us.s3.dualstack.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/thumbs/120/google/223/shocked-face-with-exploding-head_1f92f.png" alt="" width="20">
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

<img alt="Picture of Shane Parrish" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTcxODc3NTE5LmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Dave Chan</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">He's been called "Wall Street’s biggest influencer." Pumpkin Spice veteran Ray Dalio and hedge fund all-star Dan Loeb have tuned in. We looked at his phone contact list...they all have bodyguards. And today, he's got some special tips just for Brew readers. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Shane Parrish didn't set out to become a guru for titans of finance. </strong>While he was working as a cybersecurity expert at a Canadian intelligence agency, people started paying attention to his blog, Farnam Street, which pulls lessons from the best in the biz like Warren Buffett and Charlie Munger. Parrish decided to pursue Farnam Street full-time, expanding to newsletters, podcasts, a social platform, and now...books.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">For the Pumpkin Spice Author Series, Parrish spoke with the Brew about the first volume of <a href="https://fs.blog/tgmm/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333"><em>The Great Mental Models</em></a>, his five-part series breaking down the schemas we use to think and solve problems. We discussed…</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>What the first nine models are </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Why you need to take more walks</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>How to multiply your business by zero (it'll all make sense soon) </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2019/10/23/wall-street-guru-shane-parrish-mental-models?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Check out our full conversation here</a>.</p>

Scialabba\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIn most rescue stories, we never see what happens after the castaway is saved. But in WeWork's case, we're finding out how exactly Tom Hanks gets his life back after the cargo ship picks him up. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe backstory:\u003c/strong\u003e In case you missed it, on Tuesday major WeWork backer SoftBank \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-wework-softbank-group/softbank-clinches-wework-takeover-deal-bailing-out-co-founder-idUSKBN1X11JN?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eagreed to\u003c/a\u003e a $10+ billion bailout that gives Masayoshi 80% of the company. Sources told CNBC without the bailout, WeWork \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2019/10/23/without-deal-wework-would-have-been-out-of-money-next-friday-sources-say.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ewould have\u003c/a\u003e been on track to run dry next week. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eSoftBank had already sunk $10.6 billion in WeWork pre-bailout. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eSoftBank will not treat WeWork as a subsidiary, so it won't have to include WeWork's massive losses on its balance sheet. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe deal reportedly involves co-founder and former CEO Adam Neumann walking away with about $1.7 billion after dropping off the keys, his powerful voting shares, and his chairmanship. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWeWork employees reportedly \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2019/10/22/tech/wework-softbank-takeover/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eweren't thrilled\u003c/a\u003e about that, especially since many of them aren't sure if they'll have a job soon. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThat's because...\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eYesterday, newly minted executive chairman and SoftBank alum Marcelo Claure \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2019/10/23/weworks-new-chairman-claure-says-layoffs-are-coming-in-internal-memo.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esent a\u003c/a\u003e company-wide memo relaying that layoffs were likely—the \u003ca href=\"https://www.ft.com/content/ffa49378-f5b4-11e9-a79c-bc9acae3b654?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eFT says\u003c/a\u003e as many as 4,000.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThat's about 30% of WeWork's global workforce. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe comeback plan: \u003c/strong\u003eClaure and SoftBank reportedly plan to: \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003col\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eGet occupancy rates in key markets back to about 90%. As WeWork’s expanded in recent years, they've slipped to under 80%. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003ePull out of more auxiliary regions like China. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eLay off \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/wework-employees-share-stories-about-barefoot-adam-neumann-2019-9?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ethe tequila\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ol\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eWhat there isn't currently a plan for? \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eNeumann. In his new role as \"board observer,\" he'll reportedly have 1) less than 10% of the company's equity and 2) the right to nominate two directors. But it's not clear how involved he'll be. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eMasa Son’s bringing out the Shop-Vac and the Clorox for this cleanup job. style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eJust like you can’t squeeze Vince Vaughn into a dramatic role, you can’t squeeze every earnings report into a single newsletter. But we tried our best.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eTesla \u003c/strong\u003eposted a surprise \u003ca href=\"https://apnews.com/5b9b380c9ba3411c811b220723143283?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003equarterly profit\u003c/a\u003e of $143 million and was rewarded with shares jumping more than 20% after hours. Cost-cutting measures are paying off for Elon Musk’s electric vehicle company, which \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-10-23/tesla-surges-as-musk-s-cost-cuts-pay-off-with-surprise-profit?srnd=premium\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003estated\u003c/a\u003e “operating expenses are at the lowest level since Model 3 production started.” \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eMicrosoft \u003c/strong\u003edid \u003ca href=\"https://www.marketwatch.com/story/microsoft-earnings-trounce-expectations-as-quarterly-profit-tops-10-billion-2019-10-23?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eMicrosoft things\u003c/a\u003e. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBoeing \u003c/strong\u003ethinks it’ll get U.S. regulatory approval for the grounded 737 Max in Q4. Still, quarterly profit \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-boeing-results/boeing-sees-737-max-u-s-approval-before-year-end-shares-rise-idUSKBN1X21IK?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edropped 53%\u003c/a\u003e during this hailstorm of scrutiny.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eCaterpillar’s \u003c/strong\u003eearnings usually tell us where the economy’s headed. So? “In the fourth quarter, we now expect end-user demand to be flat and dealers to make further inventory reductions due to global economic uncertainty,\" \u003ca href=\"https://www.marketwatch.com/story/caterpillar-cuts-profit-guidance-as-q3-sales-fall-2019-10-23?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eCEO Jim Umpleby said\u003c/a\u003e. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eFord \u003c/strong\u003esees \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2019/10/23/ford-earnings-beat-estimates-at-34-cents-per-share-vs-26-cents-expected.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eweakening sales\u003c/a\u003e in China.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eChipotle \u003c/strong\u003ereported its \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2019/10/23/as-chipotles-stock-slides-analysts-ask-if-its-valuation-has-peaked.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebest same-store sales growth\u003c/a\u003e in over two years on Tuesday. Get ready to see more mobile pickup lanes called ”Chipotlanes,” also an excellent name for a bowling alley. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eYesterday, researchers \u003ca href=\"https://www.nature.com/articles/s41586-019-1666-5?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eannounced\u003c/a\u003e that Google's quantum processor, Sycamore, achieved \"quantum style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThink of Sycamore as the Patriots and current supercomputers as the Jets. style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThis achievement demonstrates \"quantum speedup is achievable in a collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eToday, Nordstrom will open an NYC flagship store decades in the making, Retail Brew’s Halie LeSavage \u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/retail/stories/2019/10/23/nordstrom-nyc-flagship-nordstroms-chasing-nyc-locals?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ereports\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eSomehow, the store has managed to squeeze in as many emerging retail trends as possible under one 320,000-sq.-ft. roof:\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eFor the trendsetters:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e It’ll carry all the classic luxury department store brands, plus rotating popups for up-and-comers like Everlane and Reformation. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eFor the beauty junkies:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e 14,000 sq. ft. of \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.glossy.co/beauty/nordstrom-banks-on-beauty-services-to-drive-customers-to-its-nyc-flagship?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebeauty products\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e spread across two floors, plus services from blowouts to Botox injections.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eFor foodies:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e There are seven food and bev concepts. (Bet you didn’t know food accounts for \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.pymnts.com/news/retail/2019/new-nordstrom-location-to-offer-food-and-drink-to-shoppers/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eone of every four\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e Nordstrom purchases in stores.) \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe flagship won’t be doing all the heavy lifting. The store is supplemented by two “Nordstrom Local” concept stores, smaller shops where neighborhood customers can go for services like online returns and personal styling consultations. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eHalie’s takeaway: \u003c/strong\u003eNordstrom’s flagship ticks each box on the shopping destination checklist. But its real value is unlocking a wider retail ecosystem that balances novelty and convenience.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cem\u003eWant more retail news?
